She was an innocent looking goth girl with an olive complexion and a warm smile. She was wearing all the usual goth attire, plenty of black lace and brocade, with red and blue ribbons running through her long, silky looking black hair. She looked to be in her early twenties, with no wrinkles or worry lines yet to appear. She looked incredibly friendly and relaxed.

Amy looked at herself in the mirror in her room. She was so plain compared to this girl. So pasty. So frumpy. How could this woman be better looking than she was, if she, Amy, was perfect? She stood up, furious. She stomped over to her bookshelf and swiped everything off the shelf. She knocked her TV over and ripped up her bed-sheets. She didn't scream, or make any noise however. She looked over at the clerk who was talking to another customer. Ella smiled as, with eyes still on the clerk, she stuffed the magazine into the pouch beneath her skirt, where it came to rest across other items already hidden, which included hair clips, a bottle of vodka, and some Amazon gift cards. The clerk hadn't so much as glanced at her. Her innocent smile widened and she walked over to the clerk.

The clerk turned away from the customer he was chatting to, clearly a regular.

'What can I get you?' He smiled at the beauty.

'Just a pack of marlboro reds, please.' She smiled.

'A pretty thing like you shouldn't smoke,' the clerk said in a light voice.

Ella laughed, a soft, well practised laugh.

'Oh, I don't,' she waved her hand. 'They're for my boyfriend.' Her brown eyes twinkled as she saw the man's shoulders slump at the mention of a boyfriend.

'So, they'll be 10.50, miss,' the light tone was gone from the clerk's voice. Ella almost burst out laughing, but instead handed over 15 dollars.

'Don't worry about the change, put it in the box,' she said, pointing at the charity box next to the cash register.

'Are you sure, miss?' The clerk asked, raising his eyebrows.

'Yeah, they need it more than I do, right? And besides,' she leaned in close to the clerk. 'It's my boyfriend's money anyway. He wants the change, he can go the shops himself, yeah?'

Then she leaned back and smiled again and the clerk laughed. He was still chuckling as Ella left the store and walked to her car parked around the corner. She opened the backdoor of the car, pulled the pouch out from beneath her skirt and threw it on the back seat. She slammed the door and then opened the front and sat in the drivers seat. She turned the engine on and put the car in idle. She took out the pack of cigarettes, unwrapped the cellophane, and put one in her mouth. She lit up and blew out a stream of smoke as she put the car into gear. As she drove past the store, she saw the clerk running out of the store. She waved through the window and blew a smoky kiss to the clerk who raised his fist angrily at her whilst yelling 'thief!'

The car swayed from side to side as she struggled to regain control. Luckily, there were no other cars about, and she managed to pull the car over gently. She breathed heavily. Jack. Your average collage student, no super powers or special abilities that make him abnormal from everyone else, no club or activities that he was assorted with.

you wasn't popular or unpopular, just an average guy with average skills and normal friends.

Like everyone else in the school's hierarchy you heard the same rumours and secrets about cursed places, scary legends and folklore like a supposed cursed costume shop that appears near Halloween or to those it deems worthy. Those that enter never come out the same again as you and everyone else heard.

it doesn't say how they came out, just leaving it out there in the wind which added to the Mystery where several stories started to pop up that always ended with poor sod dying in the end.... but you didn't believe the horse shit the jocks like to use to scare the nerds and geeks into doing their homework for them.

You were working on some extra homework or school work after college hours and in the dead of night, calling it quits as you finished on another piece on the large pile of assignments you were given, you stuffed all of your finished work back into your locker and took your back pack as you left.

the streets of the town was empty and quiet, no small peep or living being to be seen or heard as you walked the streets, passing by the lit but barely empty shops and restaurants as you travelled back home, the way back you were so caught up in your day dreaming that you noticed that you were no longer in familiar surroundings.

you were on no street that you were familiar with, no road or signs to tell you where you were, the only source of light in the dark covered streets was the brightly lit costume shop that you were standing outside of.

you didn't know how you got here or what but you had to know where you were and how to get back to a familiar area that you were familiar with, seeing the lights on and the sign saying open you threw caution to the wind and entered the seemingly empty shop.

the bell rang as you opened and walked in yet no being or person came forth to the counter to address you as you walked in further and couldn't help but be in awe at the large, and by large You mean giant grand hall of costumes and clothing as far as you're eye can see.

you walked around the extremely large shop, following the path as you eyed the assortment of clothing, mostly made for women in a sexy manner, costumes made for Halloween, Masks and other items that caught you're eye until you saw what could be the main desk but no one attending to it.

Approaching it you again saw nothing out of the ordinary apart from the large sign having over it saying *Welcome to Cursed Emporium of clothing, costumes and items. we provide everything to your hearts desire. Feel free to take and try on many of our exotic and rare objects, we do not judge or discriminate on your choices. we are always open and available to your needs whenever you want. all items are free and can be returned whenever but be warned that the affects are not permanent and can be removed.* it read out.

Odd as it was, you couldn't help but feel enticed by the many alluring items surrounding you as you felt the need to try one of them on, the idea was greatly increased because it was the last week day so collage wasn't on until next week leaving you free for tonight and the week end.

having decided to stay and explore you decided to go for the.....?

Which Aisle did you go for?
13131.title: Jack, an average collage guy

131311.content:
It was coming close to Halloween and you did need a costume for the Halloween party that comes every year, deciding to get one before the month hits and event hits, you followed the map and directions though then endless shop until you came upon a whole area dedicated to Halloween with various monster styled costumes including mask's and accessories.

rifling though the area as you skimmed and looked through the many assortment's of scary or other clothing and masks you decided to focus on....?

what group of items did you focus on?

1313121.content:
call it being perverted or what ever else people would say, you were curious about the female section of the metropolis of unique items this store had to offer, following the map and the directions you travelled through the large city wide store until you came upon the women's section were clothing such as dress's, skirt's and.... Lingerie's which you couldn't help but eye with a burning desire in your pants.

Hey, you're a man! you have a right to look at sexy articles of clothing that was sandwiching nicely into the Manikins large rounded ass that looked oddly enough like a sexy woman minus the mouth less and eyeless face upon it's posing form.

As you stared in wonder you decided to try out....?

which aisle did you go for?

131312121.content:
You move and browse through the women's swimsuit aisle, always glance and looking for any camera's to see your suspicious behaviour in the women's section but oddly enough there were no camera's anywhere to be seen so you relaxed... only just a bit as you looked and skimmed through the articles of clothing that ranged from normal to sexy before you.

looking at the assortment of women's swimwear you saw before you before picking....?

what swimwear did you pick?

1313121221.content:
Jack thought about what to wear to the Halloween party and he comes to the idea of dressing like a girl.

His hair is alright longish anyway so he thought "why not" it's something different from his usual ghost costume.

He walked down the Aisle and after some deliberating decided on some blue jeans (mainly because it's October and it's cold), a purple vest top, black ankle socks, dark pink and purple training sneakers and finally a black and purple bra and knicker set and a pair of fake tits.

He smiled at himself as he walked up to the counter to pay then left for his house.

Once back he shaved his arms, legs, under arms and face and very light make up with a sticker that looks like a bite on his neck that he got from another shop... He then put some concealer and he was ready.

He put everything on and left for the party... He was looking forward to the surprise and reaction from his friends as usual he doesn't put any effort into his costumes, but this year is different...

13131212211.content:
As Jack walked to the party he realised the bra he's wearing seems a lot more comfortable... He thought "strange" but continued on his way.

What he doesn't know is the costume is possessed be a mischievous spirit of a girl.

The spirit had turned Jack's fake breast into completely natural real one's and adjusted the bra accordingly.

Jack reached the party and met with his friends that thought his costume was awesome and a brilliant idea.

The spirit continued to change Jack throughout the night...

13132.content:
Veronica was very apprehensive as she stepped inside the dimly lit costume store. She grimaced as she saw the unnerving array of Haloween paraphernalia, realistic looking blood, stained cleavers and jars filled with bloodshot eyeballs.

She had just been staring at a spider filled glass display when she heard a rustling from behind her. She turned round and jumped when she was met with the ugly, moles face of the shop owner. "Aagh! Sorry, you must be Aunt Harriet. Sorry about the scream..."

Aunt Harriet laughed it off, replying, "Don't you worry, cutie-pie. Happens all the time. So, what brings you to Aunt Harriet's Arcane Artifacts and Knick-Knacks?"

Veronica squirmed, nervously twirling one of her light brown pigtails and adjusting her foggy spectacles. "Well," she lisped due to her awkward braces, "I've been invited to a senior Halloween party! Well, my sister was and our mom forced her to bring me, but still, a SENIOR party! I'm gonna be the only freshman!"

Aunt Harriet stroked the tiny wisps of hair on her chin as she eyed Veronica from head to toe. "Are you REALLY sure you want to go to this party babycakes? I mean, it's pretty UNUSUAL something likes this happens to someone like..." She waved her hands over Veronica's geeky attire. "YOU."

Veronica's face dropped as she realised there was a bit of truth in what Aunt Harriet said, immediately sending guilt to the old lady. "But what do I know?!" Veronica beamed again, exposing her unattractive metal mouth.

Aunt Harriet walked behind the front desk and rummaged for a few seconds before bringing out...

1331.content:
Vanessa, she is a school teacher and a single mother. She is well-endowed woman with an hourglass figure, big breast, and huge ass. She has three kids so far, but her husband passed away few years ago. She was a loving mom and a hard worker woman. She works hard as a high school teacher guiding her student to success, in fact, she was kind of favorite teacher because she actually made lesson fun to listen too. This made her student almost never fail her class, ignoring the fact that she actually gorgeous herself and students often ogle her body.

She was a caring and loving mother at home. She always makes time to accompany her child whenever they needed her. Like right now as her youngest daughter wanted a new Halloween costume for trick or treat tonight. So she accompanied her to the town to buy a new costume for her.

She and her child had driven around the town looking for the costume her daughter wanted. So far it had been good as her daughter had chosen an angel costume at the last store they visited, they had visited almost all store in town before this. They drive home right after that, but on the way home, her daughter saw a costume store they haven’t visited yet. So, that leads us to which she was standing inside the store her daughter saw.

She felt weird about this store as she didn’t remember this store on the road to her home before. Her daughter obviously didn’t felt the same, she was having fun looking around the store for anything that caught her eye. Vanessa look around the store too as she walked around the alley of the store. The clerk was an old man and not a creepy old man, that’s a relief for her, he was just standing behind the counter staring into oblivion. The store itself wasn’t anything big, just a small store beside the road.

She walked around the store until her feet stumbled upon a cardbox laying on the ground. She looked at the box. An item caught her interest. What is it ?
1331.title: Vanessa, a high school teacher

13311.content:
A piece of silver ring with red ruby embedded in it caught Vanessa's eye. She grabbed that ring from the box and examine it closely. It was a bright red ruby embedded in a silver ring with a delicate pattern on it, string of word read Pupa was written on the opposite side of the ruby. The ruby itself seems to has a pattern carved into it as well. Those things make this ring really exquisite. She really likes this ring, so she brought it to the clerk.

“Find something that interests you ma’am ?.” said the old man with weary voice. He spoke slowly and steadily without any impatience. His voice even though old, sounded a little soothing.

“Yes actually, how much for this ring Sir ?.” She said as she brought the ring in her hand.

“Oh, a flawed artifact you got there ma’am. This ring actually comes in a set, but I seem to have lost it. So how about I give you this for $10 ?.” said the weary old man behind the counter. He recited the word really steady as if to make sure anyone didn’t miss anything.

“Hmm… deal then. I really like the design of this thing.” Said Vanessa as she immediately agrees with the old man. She paid it in full cash. The clerk warped the ring in a plastic bag then give it to her. She keeps the ring inside her purse for now as she planned to wear it later tonight when she hangs out with her best friend.

She then waited for her daughter to finish looking around. She stood in front of the counter as she crosses her hand in front of her chest which made her boob change shape. The store itself seems to be empty except for her and her daughter. This waiting continues for a few moments later when the clerk suddenly initiated a conversation.

“Ma’am, while you wait, would you care to hear the story behind the ring ?.” said the old man with the same weary and steady tone.

Vanessa thought it would be a good idea to pass the time, also she was kind of curious about the history of the ring, so might as well. she nodded.

“This ring is called the puppet ring, it actually a set of eleven rings with ten rings of puppet ring and a ring called the puppeteer ring, but the other one already lost in history. Most say it was destroyed. Anyway, those eleven rings were said to be made by witches in an age where they were still roaming freely, do whatever they wanted. These rings were made by a witch that likes to toy with the human. The rings hold the power to control others. The puppet rings were made as a joke and wore by the victim of the witch making them a puppet for others to use as they please. The holder of the puppet ring will be like a lifeless puppet that can be used or controlled by the person chosen by the ring to act as a puppeteer. Alone it already a terrifying cursed item.” He stopped at that part as he seemly takes a breather. Vanessa thought that this story sounds a bit ridiculous and fantasy-like. As a person of science, she rarely believes in this kind of thing. She scoffed at the old man's story.

The old man curved his mouth a little seeing Vanessa's attitude toward his story. Vanessa ignored the old man's story as she didn’t believe in magic and stuff. She just went back at waiting for her child looking at the store item.

A dozen minutes later her daughter returns with a pair of earrings on her hand. It was a silver-colored earing with a white stone dangling on it.

“Mom, can I have this ?. It matches with my angel costume.” She said as she showed the earring to her mom.

“Okay sweetie, you can have it. Here let me pay it first.” Vanessa said as her daughter give her the earring to her. Vanessa then turns around to show the earring to the clerk.

“Oh, what an extremely interesting finding. You are lucky ma’am for your daughter to take an interest in this item. Bless you.” The clerk with the same voice and tone from before.

“Oookaay. So, how much ?.” Said Vanessa a bit weirded out by the old man at this point.

“Oh, for you only $10.” Said the clerk.

“Here, thanks.” Said Vanessa paying the item. The clerk once again warped the earring in plastic bag and give it to her. Vanessa passed it to her daughter which received excitedly. She and her daughter then went straight home from there.
13311.title: An Accessory

133111.content:
Vanessa and her daughter, Emily went home after buying the accessories they choose from the costume store earlier. Emily was grinning and giddy as she was happy to have a new Halloween costume. She told Her mother all her friends in school were all bragging about their new costume and all for the upcoming Halloween trick or treat. She said that she was a bit envious about them, she would pout when she told Vanessa about the thing her friend bragging.

She still smiles while talking about hanging out with her friend. Vanessa was listening to all of her daughter rambling while sometimes commenting about the part she was worried about. Despite all the things her daughter felt about her friend, it seems she hang out with a good kid and a not bad one. Vanessa was glad as despite she was doing her best to accommodate all the free time she has with her children, she still couldn’t watch over them for 24 hours a day. She was worried her kids would be bullied in school as she had heard many cases.

It was good for her second son and first daughter as they went to the same school she teaches. That way she could monitor them all the time, but her youngest one was still in elementary school, well she was about to go to middle school. She had a friend that teaches there to watch over her, but hearing from her child that she was having fun with her friend reassures her.

Vanessa and Emily drive for about half an hour until they got back home. Emily ran straight into the house to show her siblings her new earring it seems, she really likes it as she wore it straight away before they got into the car back then. Vanessa went to grabbed Emily's costume from the car and take it to the house. The time hits afternoon to evening

================================

After settling down into the house, she went to check her child's schedule about tonight. First, she went into her eldest son's room. She knocked at the room door until she heard “come in” from inside. She comes inside and saw her son, John was getting ready for his date tonight.

He was dressed neatly with a crimson shirt and black jean pants. His hair has been combed well and nice. He was standing in front of the mirror while checking if there was any messy spot. It seems he got Vanessa’s sense of tidy which was a plus for her.

“ Where are you going dressed nicely like that honey? going to your slut of a girlfriend ?.” Said Vanessa with a hint of spite in her tone. Vanessa liked that her son likes to dress nicely for his girl, but what she didn’t like was John's girlfriend, Stacy, she had heard many bad rumors about that girl, especially about how she had slept with many men and had sold her body for money. She hates woman like that, no sense of decency.

“ Moom, Stacy is not a slut !. How many time do I have to tell you ? all of that are just rumor. She just being harassed by her peer. She just a nice girl that likes to hang out with people. Trust me, Mom.” Said Tim with a defensive tone and a bit annoyed face. He applied perfume to his body with Vanessa thought smelled nice.

“Whatever honey, I have told you many time and you won’t listen. I just didn’t want you to be deceived by that vixen, okay ?. I will not drop this case and I want you to open your eye. Maybe try hanging out with Tracy, your childhood friend next door. You and she had been close since kid.” Said Vanessa with a hint of worried and frown on her face. She leans against the door frame and crosses her hand.

“No Mom, you know I and Tracy have been distance lately. Okay, don’t bring this up anymore. I got to go as Stacy already waiting for me at her house okay. Love you Mom.” Said John as he finish his dress up and walks toward the door. He gives her mom a light hug and ran toward the front door.

Vanessa just stood outside John's room’s door with a worried face as she looks at her son's distance back. She shook her head and walk toward the living room where Emily and Jenna were still talking about in front of the tv.

Vanessa saw that Emily was still showing her new earring to Jenna which Jenna examine very closely. Very close in fact that it was weird

“Its really beautiful Emi, I wonder if I could have one as well.” Jenna said as she looks fascinated by the earring. Her voice didn’t really had any envious tone though, but an entranced one, which was odd and her one had a strange look as well.

“I could lend it to you, Sis. Don’t worry.” Said Emily as she smiled at her sister happy look. Emily didn’t notice Jenna oddity though.

“Jenna do you have any plan tonight ?.” Asked Vanessa, appearing from the hallway. This startled awake Jenna as she turns away from Emily’s earring. Emily turned around and saw her mom. Emily come down from the sofa and ran to Vanessa to hug her. Vanessa received her hug with a smile.

“No Mom, I will just laying down on my bed. All my friends seem to have a date though… Well for me nothing more relaxing than laying on my bed while reading.” Said Jenna as she stretches her body across the sofa and lies down with one of her hands supporting her hand. She was calm about her lack of boredom, but Vanessa notices a hint of sadness and yearning.

This daughter of her was a bit on the side of a late bloomer and a bit of a slob. Vanessa was worried if she fit through her circle of friends at school, but seem she had a few close friends of herself. Vanessa herself was relieved a bit about her daughter of her. Vanessa looked over her daughter's figure on the sofa and sigh a little. She walked over to her.

“Well, if you not have any plan, why don’t you accompany Emily for trick or treating tonight. It seem one of Emily’s friend, Julia brought her elder brother the same age as you along. You could acquaintance yourself with him if you want. I heard he is handsome.” Said Vanessa as she position herself behind the sofa and leans her body to the sofa. She said it with a smile as she made a hint of tease. Vanessa wanted her daughter to be more social and this is the right moment.

“YES YES, Come on sis, lets trick or treating together, pleaseeee ?.” Emily seems happy about the proposal as she ran toward the front of Jenna’s face, blocking her view of the Tv. Jenna thought of the offer and decided to go along with it, so she nodded. Little Emily was excited about this as she jumps over and over in front of Emily. This brought a smile to Vanessa and Jenna's face.

Finally, after making sure everything was fine, she went around doing chores around the house for tonight. She herself promise one of her friends to hang out at her house. Just two adult women talking about life.


The sun had set and few people had started early trick or treating. Emily already put on her new angel costume, along with Jenna's little witch outfit. Jenna costume was a bit risqué as it was a body tight one which shows her sexy figure with huge jugs and big ass. Emily's outfit was a white angel with angel halo atop her head attaches to the back, a pair of fake white angel wing and dress that wouldn’t hinder her movement. She looks so cute and angelic.

Vanessa looks at Emily and smiles. She told Jenna to watch over Emily well, never let her out of sight, and don’t busy herself until she forgets Emily. She also told her to be back before too late into the night. Jenna and Emily complied, just in time for Emily's group of friends rang the doorbell.

After making sure anything fine, Jenna and Emily join Emily’s group of friends trick or treating. Jenna seems to be interested in the elder brother of Emily’s friend, Don. Finally, Vanessa went into her room to get dressed for tonight. After Vanessa got dressed in a black-white blouse and a black long skirt with mickey mouse motif, she remembers her new ring which was still in her purse. She took it out and wore it on her finger. She felt funny how this beauty of a ring could be sold in a cheap costume shop. the doorbell rang. She got up to open the door and greeted by…
